text: Pskov (, ancient Russian spelling Пльсковъ (Pleskov)) is an old city in the northwest of Russia. It is the administrative center of Pskov Oblast. It is about east of the Estonian border, on the Velikaya River. ==History== There was Pskov feudal republic depended of Novgorod. == Sister cities == Pskov is twinned with the following cities: * ==References== == Other websites == * Official website of the City of Pskov Administration Category:Capitals of oblasts of Russia Category:Pskov Oblast
title: Pskov
